title: FS2CREW FOR THE PMDG MD-11 FS2004
description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

MD-11 pilots donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t fly their MD-11s solo, so why should you? With FS2Crew, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re no longer flying alone; youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re flying as part of a Team. Just like the Pro's do!

The PMDG MD-11 is one of the most sophisticated airliner simulations ever created, and with FS2Crew your flight simulation experience will become even more realistic and immersive as you interact with your crew the same way real MD-11 pilots do!

Run checklists, brief your First Officer for the approach, communicate with the Purser while you perform the EVAC test ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ everything a real MD-11 pilot would do you can do with FS2Crew!

Make your MD-11 come alive! With FS2Crew, put your skills to the test as you deal with in-flight scenarios, such as Air Rage, Pax smoking in the Lavatory or even a passenger having a medical emergency! Flight simulation has never been this exciting!

FS2Crew for the PMDG MD-11 was custom coded from scratch to work with the PMDG MD11, and designed in close consultation with a current MD-11 real-world First Officer to ensure maximum realism.

What you will see in FS2Crew is the way itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s done in the real-world!

Like flying Freight? FS2Crew models more than just Passenger Operations. FS2Crew for the MD-11 will also work with your MD11 Freighter models!

Sounds too intimidating for you? DonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t worry! FS2Crew MD-11 comes with a superbly written tutorial that will get you up and running in no time. A condensed version of the tutorial is also available if time is tight! FS2Crew even comes with a full tutorial written by our MD-11 pilot consultant, which can also be used to help you learn to fly the MD11 the way the professionals fly it!
